lead_paragraph: YOKEN--Joan Frye, 88, wife of Richard Lewis Yoken (August 6, 2011), mom of Tony/Pam, Hollyce, David/ Tarja, grandmom of Max/ Maria, Lia, Anna and Hannah, sister to Connie/Les Martinson, aunt to Juli/Doug/Richard Carner; University of Chicago, Brandeis, Lincoln Center. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  YOKEN, JOAN FRYE
